text: Ketika saya tiba di sore hari tidak ada petugas yang membantu untuk menurunkan barang dari mobil. Pelayanan resepsionis pria cukup baik walaupun tidak begitu ramah. Suasana lobby agak gelap karena lampu tidak dinyalakan. Saya menempati kamar deluxe yang luasnya cukup lumayan untuk 2 orang. AC kurang dingin dan ada sedikit bocor tetesan air. Kamar mandi cukup luas dengan bathtub, namun tidak ada tirai untuk menutupi bathtub ketika mandi, alhasil lantai kamar mandi jadi becek setelah mandi. Debit air yang keluar dari shower juga sangat kecil sehingga mandi menjadi lama. Untuk kebersihan kurang baik karena saya banyak menemukan spot2 yang berdebu, terutama pada ornamen dinding pembatas ruangan kamar dengan kamar mandi, debunya tebal sekali dan terlihat seperti tidak pernah dibersihkan. Channel TV sangat terbatas, hanya ada channel lokal dengan kualitas gambar yang buruk. Nilai positifnya adalah di lobi hotel ini ada minimarket sehingga tidak perlu repot untuk membeli keperluan pribadi. Selain itu restoran di hotel ini rasa makanannya enak dengan harga yang tergolong murah. Untuk kualitas sarapan juga rasanya enak, hanya variasi menunya sangat terbatas sekali. Kolam renang airnya terlihat agak keruh. Saran saya agar segera melakukan perbaikan dan perawatan agar tamu lebih nyaman menginap di hotel ini.
title: Need improvement and maintenance

text:
Kamar cukup lumayan dan bersih. lokasi dekat ke krisna dan de keranjang, cukup 5 menit bejalan kaki, pelanyanan baik, ketika tiba dikamar diberikan buah buahan sebagai welcome fruit  :)

hati hati terhadap minimarket yang ada di dekat loby natya hotel, sering kali ketika belanja mengatakan tidak ada uang kembalian padahal ternyata ada di cash registernya. karena suatu malam ada seorang foreigner seharusnya menerima kembalian 24.000 hanya diberikan 14.000 alasannya tidak ada uang kecil.  untung foreigner tersebut merasa curiga dan meminta untuk membuka cash register nya dan ternyata uang kecil ada , kemudian petugas yang melayani memberikan kekurangan kembaliannya. dan itupun tanpa memimta maaf... uh tolong pihak natya memberitahukan kepada pemilih minimarket tersebut, karena lokasi berada di loby natya. sayang kalau sampai nama besar natya hotel yang dirugikan.

Dear Ibu Yuliapaulyna, warmest greeting from Natya Hotel Kuta. We would like to express our sincere thank you for your valuable feedbacks. We glad to hear that overall you enjoyed your staying in our hotel, and we noted your input for our breakfast and we will do our best to keep improving it. And we inform you that the minimarket beside our hotel is our sister company and we put very concerning to not tolerate for every bad, rude, cheating attitudes from our staff which can disturb the whole of our guest satisfaction and company's reputation. We took a necessary action to this staff to eliminate the similar case re occurred in future. Once again we do apologize for this inconvenience and we look forward to welcoming you return to our hotel in future
Thank you

Dear  Khine Z, 

Greetings from Natya Hotel Kuta.

Thank you very much for sharing your pleasant experience and memories of your recent stay.

Thank you for taking your time to write us your experience during your recent stay. We are uplifted that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is a pleasure to hear your compliments towards our staff for their attentive and friendliness service. It is our aim to elevate our guest experiences with personal and instinctive service and ensure our guest expectation is exceeded.

We are extremely disappointed that you have had to endure a challenging breakfast experience with us and we do apologize on behalf of the team and our management. We are glad you found it convenient. We thank you again for the feedback as it is only feedback like yours will we be able to improve and reinvent our product and services. Thank you.

Dear Z3tank,

Warmest greetings from Natya Hotel Kuta

Thank you very much for sharing such a lovely review about your recent stay at our hotel. Ultimately, your positive feedback on our staff’ friendliness has tremendously motivated us to keep delivering warm service to our guests.

We are extremely disappointed that you have had to endure a challenging room experience with us and we do apologize on behalf of the team and our management. We are glad you found it convenient.We thank you again for the feedback as it is only feedback like yours will we be able to improve and reinvent our product and services. Thank you.

We look forward to welcoming you back to Natya Hotel Kuta  in the near future

Sincerely yours,

text:
Setelah beberapa kali mencoba Hotel Bintang 3/4 di Bali, menurut saya Natya Hotel Kuta ini jadi salah satu "Budget Hotel" dengan pelayanan terbaik.

Mulai dari keramahan staff ketika check-in, suasana hotel dan fasilitas kamar yang sangat baik, hingga kualitas breakfast yang sangat baik.

Meskipun kamarnya menurut saya terlelu sempit, tapi menurut saya itu bukan jadi hal yang fatal, karena ketika di Bali kami banyak beraktifitas di luar hotel.

Sukses terus untuk Natya Hotel Kuta, I'll be back there soon!

text:
Hotel Natya ini tidak terlalu besar, dan terletak di lokasi yang strategis. Berada di Jalan Raya By Pass Ngurah Rai, tidak terlalu jauh dari airport dan pantai Kuta, serta dekat dengan Simpang Siur dan Sunset Road. Harga menginap di hotel ini termasuk murah, setara dengan tarif hotel budget, tetapi pelayanan dan fasilitas yang disediakan di hotel ini jauh lebih baik daripada hotel budget. 
Saat check in, saya mendapatkan welcome drink juice markisa dingin yang segar dan manis. Sesuatu yang di luar harapan saya, mengingat saya membayar harga kamar di hotel ini dengan tarif yang murah. Dan saat masuk ke dalam kamar, saya mendapatkan kejutan lagi berupa complimentary buah-buahan tropis yang manis dan masih segar. Bahkan di hotel berbintang empat pun saya tidak pernah mendapatkan compliment buah-buahan atau cookies/kue di kamar.
Hotel ini tampaknya selalu penuh dan ramai dengan wisatawan asing yang datang dengan rombongan tour agent maupun wisatawan individu. Umumnya wisatawan yang menginap di hotel ini adalah rombongan dari negara Tiongkok, Korea, dan Taiwan. 
Meskipun selalu ramai oleh wisatawan asing, tetapi para karyawan hotel ini tetap ramah terhadap tamu-tamu domestik. Bahkan terkesan mereka justru jauh lebih ramah kepada tamu-tamu domestik daripada wisatawan asing yang menginap di sana. Staf front office dengan santai dan akrab menyapa dan mengajak saya berbincang. 
Demikian pula waitress di restoran, saat sarapan tampak memberikan pelayanan secara khusus kepada saya beberapa tamu domestik lain. Bahkan untuk tamu-tamu domestik mereka menyediakan menu sarapan tambahan yang tidak tersedia di meja buffet, tapi dipersiapkan secara khusus, dan tidak ditawarkan kepada tamu-tamu wisatawan asing. 
Kamar hotel ini memang tidak terlalu besar, tetapi cukup nyaman untuk beristirahat. Fasilitas yang tersedia cukup lengkap seperti layaknya kamar hotel bintang tiga. Mulai dari minibar, kulkas kecil, safe deposit box, senter darurat, kursi sofa kecil, meja tulis, dan tentu saja tempat tidur queen size yang nyaman dan hangat. Kamarnya bersih dan tidak pengab dengan pemandangan menghadap ke jalan raya by pass. Kamar mandinya tidak besar namun bersih dan kering dengan air hangat yang mengalir lancar. 
Di bagian samping lobby hotel ini, terdapat toko minimarket yang cukup lengkap isinya dan di dalamnya juga terdapat mesin ATM.
title: Hotel Budget yang Bagus dan Ramah

text:
Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari bandara, hanya dengan aksi 15 menit dengan tariff IDR 30K dengan meter.
Lokasi cukup strategis di jalan besar, dekat dengan minimart.
Kamar cukup bersih, walaupun semua kamar adalah non smoking room, tapi disediakan tempat merokok di setiap lantai.
Terdapat kolam renang yang mungil walaupun saya tidak menggunakannya.
Resepsionis kurang ramah, apalagi pas saya tahu saya minta extend check-out hanya 30 menit saja, karena saya masih terlalu mengantuk karena baru check-in jam 1 AM tengah malam.
Hanya minta extend 30 menit saja seolah-olah saya orang yang menjengkelkan, dan resepsionis mempertegas saya harus ontime tidak boleh lewat 30 menit lagi.
Budget hotel sih memang, tapi paling tidak lebih ramah.
Kamar standard cukup kecil, tidak terdapat lemari pakaian.
title: budget hotel dekat bandara

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini dengan menggunakan voucher dari groupon. Pelayanannya baik, resepsionis membantu kami dengan ramah. Walaupun tidak terlalu dekat ke obyek-obyek wisata, posisinya di jalan besar sehingga mudah dicari. ATM pun tersedia di tempat yang dekat dengan hotel ini. Dan walaupun kecil, terdapat kolam renang di hotel ini.

Kamar cukup baik dan bersih. Namun sangat minimalis dalam menyediakan perlengkapan di kamar. Di kamar mandi hanya disediakan sabun mandi cair, shower cap, dan tissue toilet. Tidak disediakan juga teh, kopi, ataupun pemanas air sehingga harus meminta air panas dalam teko apabila ingin menyeduh teh (yang harus dibeli sendiri).

Menu sarapan sangat terbatas sekali jenisnya dan beberapa menu cepat sekali habis. Mayoritas rasa makanannya standar cenderung hambar, kopinya juga encer. Namun, tiap hari menunya dimodifikasi sehingga tidak terlalu membosankan kalau menginap lebih dari sehari.

Bukan hotel untuk bersantai, tetapi secara overall cukup nyaman untuk beristirahat setelah seharian melancong.
title: Hotel Minimalis dengan Lokasi Strategis

text:
ini hotel sgt tdk cocok yg bepergian dengan anak. sy pesan menggunakan vocer dr groupon.
menginap 2 hari. karyawan ramah. hanya bnyk kekurangan hotel. yakni 
lingkungan cukup berisik dengan lalu lalang kendaraan.
sarapan yg tdk memadai utk sarapan. dimana menu nya roti,teh,kopi, (butter/omelet harus di minta, mrk tak menyediakan di muka). sdgkan lauk nya pun minim di mana nasi dan 4macam menu (tempe goreng, telor rebus, ayam , sayur) (bihun, lalapan bali, telor ceplok, ayam). sdg kan anak di atas 5 tahun di kenakan biaya tuk break fast nya. akhir nya setelah liat menu nya, sy lebih memilih tidak ikut makan. bonus lunch pun hanya di berikan berupa kentang goreng (french fries).
kamar tdk tersedia kulkas, kettel (hrs request dan terbatas barang nya. sy tdk dapat) gelas maupun sebatas teh/kopi pun tidak ada.
sirkulasi air mandi tidak lancar. air muntahan dari shower bisa keluar dari kamar mandi. air pembuangan wastafel bocor. (akhir nya sy harus minta kain kaki yg banyak agar air tdk rembes keluar kamar..
tidak bs mengajukan penambahan kunci kamar dimana alasan yg di berikan "emang tdk menyediakan kunci tambahan di karenakan harga card kunci yg cukup mahal. sdgkan di kamar nya kita harus menaruh card nya agar listrik tetap nyala (tdk bisa menggunakan card lain). AC kamar yg dingin nya lama. n cukup bau asap rokok. (dikarenakan kamar bersebelahan dengan dapur dan pool bar.
kolam renang oke tak ada masalah. ukuran nya minimalis dan tdk luas.
kl situasi sekitar nya si oke. sebrang jalan mal galeria. kiri kanan ada pusat factory outlet macam billa bong / quick silver. ada mini market.

text:
We were group of 8 touring Bali for 7 days, ‘Natya Hotel’ remember this name as this is the one of best in Kuta, Bali. Natya hotel is located around 15 minute drives from Ngurah Rai International airport and 20 minute walk from Kuta beach. 

We had a late check in around 10 PM, the assistant front office manager 'Made Murtini' was very pleasant and friendly in receiving us and provided a hassle free check in. She was extremely polite in answering all our query and provided useful information regarding the services at the hotel and tour sites.

We booked 4 Superior Rooms with Breakfast for excellent price! The room was lovely, stylish, super clean with one of the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on!

Room Service staff was exceptional in providing prompt service.

The Restaurant at the hotel was outstanding; we had buffet breakfast which was fantabulous. The Kitchen and restaurant staffs were extremely kind and gracious in their service. They had even asked for individual inputs regarding food to alter them for specific individual taste. We tried food from room service on many occasions, the taste and quality of the food was exceptional with affordable prices. On top of that food was delivered swiftly on an average of 18 minutes from the ordered time.

Take a bow entire Restaurant Team!!!

The front house lounge at hotel has a 24 hour mini Supermarket, which would be very appropriate for travellers to grab some quick bites, drinks and travel accessories. Reception staff was too good on a note that they even ordered Pizza from Dominos for our late night dinner. The hospitality at the Hotel was brilliant right from the check in until check out and we felt special throughout.  

Assistant front office manager was very helpful in directing us to nice pub and club & also assisted in booking Taxi frequently. She also provided us a great spa deal, without that our Bali journey would not been fulfilled. I would like to thank entire hotel management team and in particular ‘Made Murtini’ for making our stay a memorable one!!!
title: BEST stay ever in BALI!!!

text:
I stayed here with my two teenage sisters from 28 June to 5 July and my stay was riddled with issues 

Firstly - on their website, they have a booking function that allows you to cancel/ change details of your booking. This system seems to work on your side BUT no one from the hotel ever gets back to you to acknowledge the changes, even though they promise to respond via email within 2 days.

On their website they advertise "free return airport transfer" within a specific room package. What they don't stipulate clearly is that return doesn't mean there and back, as in they pick you up and drop you off at the airport - it means RETURN to the airport. One way only. So there we were, 3 teenage girls thinking they had pre-arranged airport transport only to have to find our own way to the hotel after waiting for like 2 hours 

When we checked in - they couldn't find my reservation (the one I had changed on their website). Luckily I had proof and upon consulting with someone in an office, they "found" my booking. 

We settled the outstanding amount at check in and also paid for extras like breakfast and an extra bed for my younger sister. Paid cash. 

Upon returning to the room and checking my notes, I realized that they had overcharged me by 1 night. Again, armed with proof, I went to them and they corrected the mistake

Later that evening my mother informed me that her credit card was charged yet again for a 1,2 million rupiah deposit we had already paid 3 weeks prior to checking in. I went back to the reception with proof of the double charge and the lady manning the desk said that she would have to confirm with the accountant the following day. When I went back the following day I found that they had changed staff and I had to explain the problem again. This time a man helped me and said to leave all of my details with him and that they would fix the situation and that the money would be returned within 1-4 weeks. A month and a half later and I have not heard anything from Natya hotel. 

Another false advertisement- there was no free shuttle to Kuta center, instead "it was a very cheap taxi service offered" as explained by the check in clerk. Wifi in the room was okay but kept disconnecting every 60 minutes. Breakfast was extremely limited and had very few western options. (I mean ONE cereal option is ridiculous). We ended up spending most of our money on snacks to fill us up from their minimart onsite 

The room was clean and modern and the bed and linen comfy but the shower flooded the bathroom each time (no shower curtain) and the sink had no hot water. We also had a problem with the location of the hotel on a busy freeway. We couldn't cross the 4 Lane freeway safely to go to the Galeria Mall and each time we took a taxi back to the hotel, we had to basically drive past the hotel for a few kilometers and then only could we cross an intersection and start driving in the right direction towards the hotel. 

On check out, I was met by a charge of 120K rupiah billed to my room. I realized that this was for an advertised "free lunch" as per their website and it took 30 minutes of convincing for them to award the free meal to me. I also realized that I had left a travel pillow in the room earlier in the morning and that it was now missing. I asked if housekeeping had reported anything as found and they said no. I had to insist that they check with housekeeping again because I was certain that my pillow was left behind. Eventually and miraculously they found my pillow in the housekeeping quarters 

Overall my stay was just a nightmare and I could never recommend this hotel to anyone else. Nothing was as advertised
title: Horrible admin, basic hotel

text:
To have a different atmosphere, I choose to stay at Natya Hotel Kuta. This is a budget hotel. Located at roadside of highway Ngurah Rai toward to international airport from Sanur. Many shopping centers around, like Bali Mall Galeria only 10 minutes walking, Mr. Kuta Bali giftshop opposite of the hotel, Hawaii giftshop only 10 minutes by walking. This hotel is suitable for shopper or buyers.

Natya has 1 big swimming pool, 1 restaurant, 1 meeting room. Outside guests can swim there at cost IDR 15,000 / pax. Every Saturday night there is Pasar Grill such as barbeque market. It’s a BBQ dinner. My nieces and I enjoyed the dinner very much. So many kind of food : chicken, seafood, sweet corn, fried rice, fried noddles, satay, sausages, vegetables, condiments (I like sambal matah Bali, it’s very tasty). For all you can eat, IDR 65,000 / pax is very reasonable price!

Then for breakfast, also abundant of food! It served buffeet, we can choose and take our food by ourselves.

I love the bedroom especially pillow cases and wall decoration with blue color. So nice! Our bedroom is at 3rd floor. We can see others swimming down there.

The 2nd day was raining all day. So we just relax and watched movies. In the lobby, there is Coco minimarket. We enjoyed snacks and ice cream to spend the day.
title: Abundant of Food When We Stayed at Natya Hotel Kuta

Natya Hotel Management

I will never recommend this hotel to my friends!!! No more!!

text: My boyfriend and I stayed here primarily due to it's location near the airport.  However this hotel might not be a bad shout if you're also interested in the beaches, nightlife and shops of Kuta - you can walk to town in around 10-15 minutes.  Sure it's on a busy road but we weren't troubled by traffic noise at all in our room at the rear of the property.  There's a beautiful pool, breakfast's good and very plentiful and the staff are friendly and super-helpful (we were presented with a welcome drink on arrival which was a lovely touch!).  The room itself was great - really clean with a nice bathroom, towels, toiletries, tea and coffee making facilities and a TV.  Top marks!

text: Have just stayed here for 4 nights until we left bali yesterday. Upon entering the hotel a hotel porter took our bags for us. At check in we were given the wifi code and our key and the porter took us to our room.  We then recieved a welcome drink which was a lovely gesture. As we entered our room we realised they had put us in a double when we had requested a twin. This was no issue and the porter promply rang downstairs to reception who said it was no problem and they would change it. The porter then went to collect the new key and took us to our new room. We were moved to a twin on the ground floor room 107. Room was clean with tea and coffee facilities and 2 bottles of mineral water that were all replaced daily and as well as this the beds were made and dirty towels replaced with clean ones daily. The bathroom was clean and  the shower was hot and powerful. Toiletries were given including bodywash, toothbrush and toothpaste set, shower cap etc. the pool area was spotless and although there are only 6 sun beds me and my friend were the only people ever at the pool which was lovely. I would reccommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay near kuta but not right in the center. It took about 10/15 minutes to walk into kuta center via a little laneway near the hotel. The only bad thing I have to add is that if you need to get to the airport they charge 100,000 IDR for a 7 minute journey which i personally think is way too much when a bluebird taxi wouldve probably cost half the price. Besides this, I would definitely stay here again if I ever come back to bali.
title: Natya hotel kuta review

And since the property also located close to residential, you can easily find restaurants serve local cuisines at affordable price. We stayed in a long weekend and we didn't make any reservation regarding local transport prior to arrival, fortunately Natya's staffs were very helpful and they quickly arranged this for us.

text:
First of all, it was hard to book here. Prices were negotiable. 
Easy check-in, but no information about the area. And if we asked which direction to go, we were pointed in the wrong direction. Hotel is also pretty far from the center. A 30 minute walk! 
The sheets on the bed were stained with blood from previous gast. It took us 3 trips to the reception to get them cleaned. 
Laundry service was a joke! It took over 24 hours to wash our clothes. And even then they weren't ready according to the reception. But if you push trough by magic your clothes will appear.
During breakfast you will see the staff eating from the buffet. And also hiding some food if the gast eat to much of it, so they can have some later. 
Horrible music on the hallway all day and all night long. Music can be heared in the rooms which makes sleeping hard and wake you up in the early morning.
If you plan to book this hotel as a stop from/to the airport it is nice place to stay.
title: Very disappointing

Marione Putu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Actually I like the hotel, clean, easy to reach, and I got a nice view (pool). The room was OK, and the swimming pool was pretty large. I was very satisfied with the dishes in the restaurant. The hotel is suitable for groups, but not suitable if you like quietness because when the group (especially students) came, the corridor became very crowded, kids ran along the corridor, slammed the doors, talking loudly even until midnight.

When I checked out, I asked them to check my room just to make sure nothing left. They said OK and nothing left, then I left the hotel. But then I remembered, that I forgot my charger. I called them, asked about it, and they said yes, they found my charger, so I had to go back again to the hotel. I advise you to pay more attention to your guest request.

Even though I love the dishes in the restaurant (I didn't take breakfast menu), the staffs need to be trained better. Ask politely if the guest (who eat that dish) has finished or not. Just because the guests left or stop eating, it doesn't always mean that they're done with the dish.
title: Could be better

text: clean hotel with friendly helpful staff, swimming pool is nice and clean, good restaurant and room service but better not eat in your room to keep some cockroaches coming at your doorstep to feed on food remain when you put your empty dishes out in corridor. my room had no minibar but had wonderful view (room 320) , location seems far from beach, but if you take first street left and walk 10 minutes you will be in Kuta beach, i believe it is a good location. staying 12 nights including Nyepi was pleasant stay however the room lacks enough room for clothes yet still nice room and very nice staff.coco minimart is in lobby so no need to cross the not so easy to cross NGURAH RAI BYPASS to buy anything from nearby supermarket.WIFI was very good.
title: good hotel

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I stayed in Natya Hotel for 4 days 3 nights. My husband and I was given room no. 214 which has the pool view. Wifi connection is superb. First impression of the room was averagely fine. Bed linen and towels seemed to have some stains (God knows where it came from) but tolerable. Air-con unit was noisy. The shower tap for hot water was a bit weird. The water is either too hot or too cold. It took us quite a while to find the optimum water temperature before showering.  From the 2nd day onwards, we realized there were baby cockroaches inside the room and toilet. Informed the hotel manager, Mr Fandyro during our checkout. Shortly after, we saw a pest control van at the hotel's drop off. I don't know if that van was called upon to attend to our feedback. The only shortcoming is that the rooms were not given a spare access card to be placed so that the air-con unit is continuously running. During that period, the weather was scorching hot and when we got back into the room, the air-con unit took about 1/2 hour to cool the entire room.
title: Comfortable but condition of room can be improved

owner_response.text:
Dear Mrs. Jina,

Thank you for your great feedback, appreciated so much. Currently we are doing some maintenance to improve the quality of the room, including special treatment to eliminate the issue of cockroaches. Apologized for not being given a spare key which basically can be obtained through front desk.  Meanwhile look forward to welcoming you back.

Best regards,
Putu Marione

text:
Standard rooms are small, but clean. I had a chance to talk to the marketing manager and gave her some idea to put a small simple vase + flower in room so it wont look empty. Cos it was very "empty" when first time i go inside. No amenities in the bathroom (shampoo and soap is in dispenser). They dont even provide drinking glass, really nothing in the room. I think for 3 star hotel they should have it.

The reception, I found, dont have many things too. For example when I asked for tape, they dont have it. Pen marker, they have it but it had no ink, she also didnt bother to find a new one, she just said that she didnt have it. Not very helpful

The breakfast is okay, they provide tea but you have to pay for your coffee.. Food taste is just okay.

text:
I stayed there for three nights. 
When I arrived, they cannot find my reservation. I booked via hotels.com. And I have to send them the confirmation e-mail to prove I did make a reservation and I already paid.
The room looks really nice from website, but it's actually small. It's very clean everywhere in hotel. I booked the room with breakfast but that was probably the worst breakfast I've ever eaten. I remember the breakfast was served from 7;30am til 10:30am. I arrived at 9am and everything was pretty much empty. Food was cold and the juice tasted like water. Anyway, it was really closed to the airport. So it would be great for people catch early flight.

text: This review is based on a one night stay - very convenient for the airport. Room was clean and comfortable with good ensuite. Restaurant excellent not only for smoothie and coffee when we arrived but also for dinner and breakfast. Restaurant opened 15 mins early so we could take breakfast before we left for the airport at 7, which was very accommodating. The only problem was the arrangement for the airport shuttle - you pay in advance when you check in but in the morning no one on reception knew. Suggest you order a Bluebird Taxi 0361 701111 (around 40,000Rp as against 100,000Rp for the hotel shuttle) Why did we take the hotel shuttle then? It seemed churlish not to pay the premium when the room was only £19!
title: Pleasantly surprised,

text: This hotel was good, no matter in the customer service, luggage service, room condition and surroundings. A nice pool there but we din spend time on it. So we decided to walk to the famous beach with our map. And it took us half an hour to get to the area. Quite exhausting in the end as we got to walk bak at night. Moreover, less choices for dining in that area. Normally, most of the restaurants are in the town area near the beach. Hope it provides a little info.
title: Nice hotel, BUT abit far from the beach.

text: We arrived in Bali for a 9 Day holiday of which 6 days were already planned. The Hotel arranged for Airport transfer in a comfortable car at a nominal price. It took us less than 25 min to get to the hotel from the airport. Once we arrived we were overwhelmed by the kind and smiling staff. The lady at the reception took time off to sit and discuss our plan and arranged for an excellent driver who was always honest and on time. The rooms were a bit tiny but very very well maintained. These rooms are perfect for people who plan to be outside visiting various places and retreat for a goodnight sleep. The bed was spacious and very comfortable. The hotel poolside bar is very well maintained and the restaurant/bar staff are excellent. Since we are vegetarians the kitchen staff went out of their way to cook special vegetarian breakfast for us. I would definitely choose this hotel if i ever visit Bali. Hats off to all the staff who made our stay very memorable.
title: Excellent Value For Money

Dear iamzuhairr,

Greetings from Natya Hotel Gili Trawangan

We are delighted to know that you have experienced the best level of hospitality from our staff'. text: I stayed here for a week and straight away I was warmly welcomed by the staff, who are all incredibly friendly and helpful. My room was perfect for me, with probably the most comfiest bed I've ever slept in at any hotel. All of the facilities worked and every day they would give you bottles of water when housekeeping came. It's a bit far away on foot for any restaurants near by so I mostly ate at the restaurant in the hotel or ordered room service. The food was always delicious and reasonably priced. There is a little 24 hour convince market with a atm in the hotel too, which was super handy for big bottles of water and some late night snacks. If you're not driving your own scooter, then the likes of Kuta beach can be quite far, however the hotel offers a free shuttle bus to the Discovery Mall and Beachwalk, which is really good and it is a cheap Go Jek scooter ride back. The only negative thing I could say is that the walls are a bit thin and you do hear people in the corridor, who unfortunately were not the most curtious when it came to other guest. However, it wouldn't be fair to hold the hotel responsible for other guests lack of manners. Overall, I would definitely recommend this hotel
title: A good stay

text:
Stayed here for a week in August 2019. From check-in to check-out, the service was fantastic, and the staff were excellent. Bu Murtini at the front desk was great for advice on places to go around, and organized us a spa trip, and Pak Denny, the manager, was extremely welcoming and friendy.

The food from the restaurant was very well priced and tasted great, Same with the drinks from the bar. The room, while not huge, was very clean, nicely presented, and well equipped for our needs - Natya was a fantastic home away from home as we explored Bali - The location is only ten or so minutes from Seminyak and walking distance to Mal Bali Galleria.

As a bonus, the pool area is great to just lay and relax or enjoy a quiet swim.

Being right in the middle of Kuta and on one side of JL Ngurah Rai bypass meant that it took a while to get a taxi, but we solved that by hiring a scooter for the rest of our stay - There was plenty of parking in the basement and access was easy.

As an added bonus, the convenience store downstairs is open 24h and has an ATM and good stock of food, drink, and souvenirs.

We'll definitely be back! :D
title: Fantastic hotel! Natya is luar biasa!

text:
Being in Bali, I'd expect to spend most of my time out of the room so I'm banking on a room with basic amenities to suit my needs. Natya Hotel goes above and beyond in terms of service! I was picked up by a very friendly and amiable driver who was proficient in both English and Bahasa. He remembered me from our first encounter at the airport and was always ready with a greeting and suggestions of places to visit each time he sees me in the lobby.

Every single staff I have encountered, from front desk to restaurant servers, to housekeeping are ready with smiles and greetings and it absolutely makes my day! For breakfast, I was offered the menu and enjoyed the ease and comfort of having my food delivered to me. They remembered my orders from the day before and would ask if I would like the same thing.

Each time I called down to the front desk for some bottled water, they would confirm my request and then ask if everything was okay with the room. As I had a Do Not Disturb sign on my door, they would call back and ask permission for housekeeping to knock on the door to deliver my water. Small details like this goes a long way in showing their respect for privacy.

My room on the second floor overlooking the pool was great! I had natural light from the windows though the room was a bit dim for my liking in the evenings as they used warm lights. Limited channels on the TV and it can get quite loud down at the pool but they don't bother me much as I was out most of the time. I was greeted with a personalised welcome scroll in my room upon arrival that made me feel special :)

Their shuttle service is available at 11 AM and 4 PM daily to Discovery Mall and Beachwalk Mall. But if you're travelling solo like me, I'd suggest taking GoJek or GrabBike as it's much faster than getting stuck in traffic in a car.

So for a basic stay with excellent service that comes naturally to the wonderful team of Natya Hotel Kuta, come stay with them! No regrets!
title: Excellent Service!

text:
I had to try out many hotels on Bali and expected this hotel to be mediocre at best, seeing it prices. I was positively surprised! Service was extremely competent and professional and the staff were constantly making sure my stay is the best as it can be. Breakfast was rich and had an above average quality, the restaurant was amazing. Best dinner at a restaurant I had in Bali.
The room was well equipped, bed was comfortable.
The Location may be at a busy bypass, but I couldn't notice from my room.
It is almost right in front of a big mall and many big attractions are easy to get to. 
I'd say it's the best choice you can make when you visit Kuta.
title: Positive surprise

text:
First of all, two thumbs up for the staff, especially the reception/concierge and housekeeping. Very friendly and attentive to the fullest. Turn down is great. 

Breakfast is acceptable although there is an acute shortage of seating, especially when there's busloads of tourist occupying the entire restaurant. Something needs to be done to add additional seating immediately when it gets busy. Replenishment not quick enough. 

Location is great, close to airport, close to Legian, Seminyak and Kuta areas. Situated along a very busy road, crossing it is almost impossible, really impossible. 

Soundproofing is bad. You can hear clearly noise from next door and opposite, even traffic, so waking up before 6 is pretty normal, because that's when noise starts. 

Owned by the Coco Group, the Coco Mart staff seemed really apprehensive and reluctant in accepting "big" 100K bills for purchase of small ticket items, like a drink or a light for example, you need to "prove" to them you don't have any small change.
title: Staff and location are awesome

text:
The team, room, food, location, everything was perfect. I loved my stay here! I have just left after 3 nights.  Before my arrival, I was in contact with the hotel to arrange my airport pick up.  On my arrival, I was greeted by 3 members of the team and a welcome drink.  All the team were so friendly and helpful, nothing was too much trouble for them.  Special shout out to Wahya and the girl on reception who checked me in on Sunday evening at 9pm (sorry, I didn't catch your name).  Also the waiter who was singing on the karaoke on Tuesday evening :)The hotel provides a comp shuttle to the 2 shopping malls twice a day.  Breakfast was fab, so much choice.  The caramelised pineapple pancakes were delicious!  The room was spotless, the housekeeping team came back in the evening to replenish water etc.  
The location, for me was perfect.  Close to everything and walking distance but far enough away from the parties and noise.
I wish I could have stayed longer, and if I'm ever in Kuta again, this will be the place I stay.  Thank you guys, keep doing what you're doing.  You're all fabulous.
title: Perfect

text:
I would certainly recommend Natya hotel to anybody staying in Kuta. We stayed here for one night since we had a morning flight back from Bali.
The location is good, its only 15-20 mins walk to the kuta art market, the beachwalk, the mall galeria.
The staff was courteous and helpful and always had  genuine smile on their face. The moment we entered the hotel, we realized the ambiance is very good. The check-in was smooth with a welcome drink.  Toiletries were provided including soap, shampoo, dental kit, toilet paper, shower cap, towels, and hair dryer. The room also had a locker.
A lot of Koreans were here during breakfast time with their buses waiting, so breakfast was a rush time but the staff handled it well. Yuli, one of the staff was so fast in clearing up the tables and informing us about the breakfast options.  
Complimentary breakfast provided was also very good.
title: Great stay

text:
We stayed at this hotel for 4 days and what a great hotel! Nice clean rooms and pool and the breakfast was included and while the selection is small, you can still get your eggs any way you want and order extra from the breakfast menu at no extra cost. 

The french toast and pancakes are delicious! Actually I want to make special mention to the food, we ordered a few times from the menu for dinner and even the simple chicken and rice bowl was absolutely delicious. The food is better than some of the bigger hotels, we were so impressed! 

And the service is so good, even if you hang the “do not disturb” sign so they can’t clean your room, if they see you in the hallway they ask to make sure you don’t need water and toilet paper. When you ask for ice, they bring you a big bucket to your room. So friendly and accommodating. 

Another nice thing they did, we booked a day extra but because of a mistake in our flight booking we had to leave early and were so disappointed that they cannot do refunds as we booked through bookings.com. But they offered us a free dinner for two to say sorry. I feel that was very nice of them to do this. 

They also have a free shuttle to Beachwalk Kuta mall and Discovery mall (across from the Waterbom waterpark). You just have to organize your own way back (the walk back from Beachwalk is quick so no worries).

Last thing: they have a small Coco shop in reception that is open 24 hours if you need snacks, drinks or beer.

All in all a great experience and very affordable!!
title: Great service and great food

text:
The hotel was spectacular in terms of the services they offered to me. They waited on me hand and foot, always with a smile and with kind greetings. They cleaned my room twice a day eventhough it was not necessary. They always asked if I needed extra bottled water or new towels or sheets. My room was right infront of the pool. The pool was clean and I even asked for a floating breakfast. They allowed for Gojek to pick me and drop me which I was thankful for. The hotel is around a commercial area with loads of restaurants and shops within walking distance. Very near to the airport as well and they do taxi arranging for you if you need any. You can walk to Kuta Beach and Legian Beach if youre into walking as they really are not that far from the hotel. The hotel has a 24 hour convenience store at the reception which is another plus. They also have their own massage parlour. Very near the Duty-Free Mall and Cinema (walking distance). A good quiet place to unwind after a busy day out. 

I stayed here for 10 days and I had a very refreshing and comfortable stay. They always informed me if there was any activity taking place on the day on written notes that they left near the complimentary water and coffee. 

Could not ask for a better hotel for my stay in Bali and I definitely will come back again! 

Thank you!
title: Natya Kuta Hotel

They even made extra effort to call my booking in Sheraton for the day pass because I was not picked up on time. They even know my klook packages schedule . I love how accommodating they are and they even grant my request to give me a pool view room. The room was nice and clean and they even left me a personalized note and also some fruits. The service is so good as if i was in a 5 star hotel. the breakfast food is also so delicious i even tried the floating breakfast and it was amazing. I really love this hotel they make my stay in bali really wonderful. everything here is great their customer service, the staff are wonderful the food the room the amenities is really beautiful. I will definitely come back. Thank you so much for making my stay in bali amazing its really a wonderful experience 10/10 for me 😊
title: Best Hotel!

text:
We have been to Bali many times, this time we chose Natya Hotel Kuta.

I must say the hospitality in this hotel is just out of the way, the staff treated us so nicely especially daily when we woke up and came out of room. The whole staff greeted us, incredible. They were actually concerned as to how you slept or if you needed anything else.
The hotel has a shuttle service which is one at 1pm and other at 4pm
I feel there should be 1 at night too, the only thing they could do more.
And the most important thing which was amazing , you have a buffet breakfast which might look so small but then you are handed over a menu and you can choose from that anything and they will make it fresh,all inclusive in your room rate.
Around 1.2 km from Kuta square.
An Indomart just opposite.
All in all a great stay.

Thank you 😊
title: Amazing experience 🙌

text:
The staff were super friendly, we even got a welcome note from the management as we checked in. Initially they told us that the property doesn't have a refrigerator but when we went in our room there was one. EXCELLENT customer service throughout. Staff were extremely friendly and super helpful they kept on asking us if everything was up to our expectations. We felt at home throughout. They have a mini-mart downstairs which is really convenient. Also they have kuta city center drop offs twice a day. Highly recommended as it is very close to the Airport so ideal location just before/after a flight.

The location was a bit away from the kuta center and didn't have many places to eat. The rooms were not cleaned on the 2nd day of our stay, guess they missed out on it coz we were in our room exactly during the time their cleaning rounds were happening and we forgot to inform the front desk about it, if we did I am 100% sure that they would have looked in to it.

text:
This hotel is a realy nice place to stay. I only stayed for 1 night, but wouldn't mind staying longer. The girls at the reception desk are really amazing and will help you with anything! All other staff is super friendly and will say hi to you when passing by. When I arrived the housekeeping team wished me welcome and informed me if I had any questions to let them know. There was even a small letter in my room with my name, loved that! Small details are the key. 

I loved it for the room, which was super clean. You have everything you need, plus the ketlle is a big plus! The wifi is strong, and for me who needs to work, that is so important. 

The food in the restaurant was nice and they played music there, which I loved and used the time after dinner to work. The waiter in the restaurant, Robby, was amazing! He was working so hard and ensuring all the time you have everything you want/need.  Unlike the girl who was working with him, she was just busy checking her phone constantly. This really annoyed me (even I know this is accepted in Bali under staff) because when I wanted another drink she didn't even looked once to me so I could call her. As soon as Robby came back to the restaurant (he went out for a good 10/15 minutes) he looked at me and I called him over. He came immediatly and helped me with my request. He really deserves a raise if you ask me!

Thank you for all the good care and you will see me back again!
title: Great stay!

text:
This is no less than a 4 star property. We got a pickup and drop as well from the hotel.

Staff- Extremely courteous and polite staff; forever smiling and ready to help at all times. Very well dressed and pleasant.

Rooms- Beautiful Spacious Rooms with neat and clean washrooms. Absolutely hygienic. Toiletries provided.

Breakfast- Lovely breakfast with special menu for customisation. The chef made omelettes, pancakes, french toast for us. Service provided on table for anything you want.

Location- Its on the main road on Kuta, near to kuta beach( 15 min walk) As there are no horns in Bali, despite so much traffic, you’ll not get disturbed by the location at all. 
You’ll have to take a taxi for any main tourist spots you want to go to. 

Spa- we indulged in the natya’s refresh spa and aromatherapy. The room was extremely clean and well presented. Washroom also had a tub and it looked like if the spa room was newly made. The therapist did a decent job. Though I feel, In bali, there might be better spas with a view. This one was in a closed room. 

Overall we were absolutely happy with our stay over there!! Great going Team Natya :))
title: Unbelievably good for its price!

text:
Location :5* Natya Kuta is located on the Sunset Road, Kuta city which is best location for connectivity for airport or sightseeing.Kuta beach is on 15 mins walk.
Rooms : 4* Rooms are in standard size.Bathrooms are bit small but its ok for the price it is available.Interior is good and fresh.There is no freeze for basic rooms. 
Food : 5* Buffet Breakfast is good. I tried Saturday dinner with barbeque and it was very good.Overall taste and menu is best. Limited Vegiterian options.
Ambience and Aminities:5* Hotel is quite and homely. Swimming tank is good.There is 24 hour shoppee in hotel which is great ease. Free shuttle to Discovery mall is added advantage.
Reception & Staff: 5++* Staff(Reception,Housekeeping,kitchen)is very cooperative and humble.Full marks to staff and hospitality. Tour booking is also provided. (But the driver with me was not professional and too commercial. Offcourse not Hotel's fault.) 

Overall experience is too good and had wonderful stay.
title: Perfect Stay for Bali

All the staffs i’ve encountered throughout my stay were friendly and courteous, this was hard to find in any other hotels i’ve been to. Breakfast was delicious. Room was lovely, spotless and clean, it was also nicely decorated upon request. Bath tub was huge too! The deluxe room was a perfect size. Thank you so much Natya Hotel for keeping us safe throughout our stay, we were sad to leave as this was the best hotel we’ve been to. I really love this place. Our stay was unfortunately short but will not be our last. We will definitely come to Natya hotel if given the chance to have a holiday here in Bali.

text: Just got back from Bali last weekend. We stayed at the Natya Hotel in Kuta. We arrived at the hotel around 11pm and were greeted with a cold welcome drink that we all enjoyed. The hotel was spotless and that includes our rooms, which were very comfortable and a nice size and were made up twice a day, and any of our clothes left laying around our room were folded nicely on our beds (Thank you).  My severely disabled son was with us too, and he loves birds and bought a toy parrot while we were there, the staff made his bed with the parrot tucked up in bed which was a nice touch, my son loved it.  Benny is the man to ask for, he was brilliant. Nothing was too much to ask of him, he was great, Thank you Benny.  A lot to choose from the buffet breakfast and it was delicious. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and are planning to stay there in October  :)
title: Everything great...P Dodd

text: I personally thought that Natya was an average hotel and wasn’t very impressed with my time here. I think to describe this as a 4-Star Hotel would be misleading because compared to the Kana Kuta (just around the corner), this would probably be a 3-3.5 Star Hotel. The rooms were small and the place (e.g. bathroom, stairs/lifts,dining area) seemed a bit run down. I also tried the buffet breakfast and it was poor - I wasn’t able to eat anything aside from the eggs and even that was quite bland. There were also flies buzzing around the fruit/desert area and this was very off putting! For all first-timers in Bali, I would highly encourage you to look outside of Kuta/Legian area. I didn’t fall in love with Bali itself until I went to Canggu and Ubud. I think for $35-$55, you’re better off finding a nice homestay in Canggu rather than a hotel in Kuta. It’s always possible to catch a GO-JEK (a cheap scooter version of Uber) back into the Kuta area if you want to go to the bars/clubs.
title: Not Great - Average Hotel

This was the first place we stayed when we visited Bali - the 3 of us - my wife, 10 year old kid and I. Paying Rp. 100,000 from the Denpasar airport means it is located within a reasonable distance.

We arrived quite late - near midnight - and had mailed the hotel in advance about our late arrival. We were welcomed with a soft drink. After that initial experience everything was great. The restaurant is good, the breakfast sported a buffet, and a-la-cart all complementary.

The only -ve side is that we realised they have charged AUD 7.43 - probably our child. But seeing that we had a good stay - they can have it!

text:
Stayed in this hotel after having done some research online. Was on the lookout for an affordable hotel, within walking distance to the DFS galleria, where the ‘Kura kura bus’ main terminus is located. This was one of the few nearby hotels. Ultimately, I did not use the Kura kura bus service even on a single occasion but found a good hotel on the pretext.
As I was arriving late night in Bali, its location of about 5 Km from the airport was ideal, being located on the main highway from the airport. The Hotel arranged a transport for me from the airport without hassles.
The Staff were very friendly and helpful, and this seems to be a trait of the Baliness people. There is hot water in the bathrooms, and  a hot water cattle is also provided for making tea/coffee. Two bottles of complimentary drinking water was provided daily. The swimming pool is near the breakfast area, but I did not use it. The breakfast was good with ample variety. I particularly liked the fried rice and the boiled maize provided. We were told that a sea food “eat all you can” buffet was held every Saturday night, but did not join in, as we were not so much of a Sea food fans. There is a convenience store, Coco mart, on the ground floor of this hotel. There are also two other marts within walking distance of this hotel. Will definitely stay here again in future visits to Bali.
title: A Good Hotel In a Good Location

text:
Due to heavy fogs in Seoul Korea, I missed my connecting flight from Bali to Perth.

Lucky for me, I had been given free accommodation at Natya.
I had never been to Bali before, so I had no expectations of the quality of the hotel or it's offerings.
I was just happy to have some wifi.
Amazing, Natya had that and more.
I felt really looked after. Picked up and dropped off at the hotel. Great double room, and a free Indonesian dinner delivered to my room.

I'm already planning my next holiday here with the family !
title: An unexpected surprise

text:
I was supposed to fly from Bali to Manila at 2:05 a.m. on February 15th, but the flight was cancelled due to the eruption of Mt. Kelut in Java, and we poor poor pitiful souls were taken to a hotel not far from the airport to await the news as to whether we'd be able to get to our destination before the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse come raging into your town and mine.
   The staff at the Natya Hotel had precious little time to prepare for the arrival of vanloads of harried foreigners, but they did a wonderful job, not only in setting us up in rooms, but in making us feeling welcome, at ease, and even able to retain some hope that all would eventually work out -- that Philippine Airlines would do its duty, and none of us would end up like the victims of Pompeii.
     The front desk manager, Yuma, is a sweet soul. I have not encountered a more professional, good-natured person in all my years of travel. I was reminded of why the hotel business is also known as the hospitality industry. One can easily forget this. In Southeast Asia, the staff tends to smile at you till the cows come home, but actually providing good serve is another matter entirely.   
      I have only one point of constructive criticism: There was a group of college-aged guys (children in the bodies of adults) from Khazakstan staying at the hotel, and they basically took over the restaurant area, talking super-loudly, wearing no shirts, and acting as if they were in their back yard, instead of at a hotel with other guests. The management should have taken action to have them get properly dressed and keep their noise down. It's not good to let any goons invade a space.
title: Some of the best service I've gotten anywhere

text:
La struttura è simile a molti hotel occidentali, è molto poco "indonesiana", ma è l'hotel più pulito che ho visto a Bali e Lombok, pulizia impeccabile, ogni giorno puliscono le stanze. La colazione è tipicamente indonesiana e buona, idem il caffè. La posizione è buona perché è a 10/15 minuti di macchina dall aeroporto e 2 km dal centro. 
Uniche note negative l'umidità che si respira in stanza (ma d'altronde è umido anche fuori) e l'assenza di un armadio anche piccolo in stanza. 
Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo.
title: Poco tradizionale ma molto funzionale

深夜着の1泊目として滞在。バスタブを使用したかったのでDeluxe Room＋朝食付きを選んだ。フロントの対応はとても良く好感が持てる。オフシーズンなのもあって、１泊3400円程度だったのだが、価格から考えると良かった。プールが見える２階の部屋は、広さは普通。ベッドは大きくコンディションも良い。バスルームは老化が目立つものの、バスタブも問題なく利用でき、シャワーもお湯もちゃんと使用できた。朝食のビュッフェは種類は多くないし味も平均的だが価格を考えれば良いと思う。ビュッフェ以外にオーダーできる１品があり、良い。場所的にサンセットロード側なので不便だが、短期滞在なら問題ないと思う。

空港への無料シャトルが今後あれば、さらにお客は増えると思う。

text:
Me hospedado en este hotel durante dos semanas, la localización es idónea al estar cerca del aeropuerto, y un poco retirado del centro.
Las instalaciones son buenas, la habitación era confortable y la cama muy cómoda, incluso nos trajeron una nevera a la habitación por nuestra larga estancia. 
El trato del personal es excelente, continuamente te preguntan si todo marcha bien o tienes algún problema o queja alguna. Incluso nos cambiaron a otra habitación más silenciosa debido a que el dormitorio se comunicaba con otro mediante una puerta, y dependiendo de los huéspedes podía ser algo molesto el descanso, como escuchar música a las doce y media de la noche o conversaciones integras.
Los chicos de la limpieza son muy eficaces, y los de recepción están siempre dispuestos a ayudarte.
Si no doy cinco estrellas en la review, es porque la conexión a Internet no funcionaba bien en la habitación, debido a mi trabajo a veces tenía que estar disponible y tenía que moverme por el hotel para poder responder los diversos correos que recibía. A pesar de que lo comunicamos e intentaron arreglar la incidencia, en ocasiones la conexión iba lenta o no funcionaba del todo, aunque en en las zonas comunes funcionaba perfectamente.
Otro inconveniente que tuve fue que en nuestra habitación se coló un roedor, y me llevé un pequeño susto al despertar y contemplarlo. Nos ofrecieron cambiar de habitación al día siguiente, aunque lo rechacé debido a que solo nos quedaba una noche y entiendo lo difícil que puede llegar a ser lidiar con estos animales. 
De todas formas, mi estancia ha sido muy placentera, incluso nos invitaron una noche a cenar en el restaurante y nos obsequiaron con el desplazamiento en coche a nuestro próximo destino en forma de compensación por los problemillas que tuvimos. 
En resumen, repetiría mi estancia en Natya hotel.
title: Muy buen hotel

text: El personal del hotel es lo mejor, realmente están para todo lo que necesites. Te esperan con una bebida de bienvenida y cuando entras en la habitación hay un basquet con fruta, tienes café y té tambien. La cama es súper cómoda!, el desayuno esta bien, por lo que pagas. Ahora bien.... el problema que encontré es que para mi gusto, el hotel es ruidoso, primero tenía una habitación que daba a la piscina y pedí el cambio a la media hora por una familia que estaban gritando como si fuera el patio de su casa, me cambiaron sin problemas pidiéndome disculpas mil veces. Seré claro... en el hotel había un bus lleno de gente de China, los cuales estaban hablando muy alto, por los pasillos a cualquier hora, fumando y tirando colillas en la piscina, escupiendo en el suelo y a las 6 de la mañana se empezaron a ir dando portazos y hablando sin cortarse . Haciendo mucho ruido para el resto de personas que estábamos alojados. Me parece que este hotel tiene muchos contingentes procedentes de China. El hotel está muy muy bien, pero no se si repetiría.
title: Buen hotel, pero...

text: Natya Hotel Kuta is een hele leuke hotel! De personeel is heel attent en aardig. Ze helpen je met alle vragen en zijn heel erg beleefd. Ze spreken goed Engels. Er is ook een karaoke set, dit was heel leuk en grappig. De personeel deed ook gezellig mee en dat was heel leuk om te zien! De kamers zijn schoon en ruim. Locatie van het hotel is ideaal, je bent binnen 15 min. bij het strand. Denny heeft ons heel goed geholpen, op de laatste dag moesten wij in de avond onze vlucht pakken. Wij mochten voordat wij weg moesten, nog snel gebruik maken van de douche. Dit was heel erg fijn, daardoor konden wij onze reis fris en fruitig voortzetten. De enige nadeel is wat er veel verkeer buiten is en daardoor moest je soms wachten of heel stuk om rijden met de taxi om bij het hotel of vliegveld komen. Echter kan het hotel hier niks aan doen. Wij hebben een mooie ervaring gehad met het hotel.
title: Uitstekend

text:
Wir verbrachten nur eine Nacht im Natya Hotel. Das Personal war wirklich sehr freundlich, und zuvorkommend​. Unser Zimmer und das Badezimmer war sauber, und wir hatten alles, was man brauchte! 
Das Frühstück sah auf den ersten Blick für Europäer leid er nicht so reichhaltig aus (ich esse morgens einfach noch kein schweinefleisch, gemüse und Reis dazu) jedoch konnte man a la carte noch etwas dazubestellen. Für unseren weiteren Transfer buchte uns die nette Dame an der Rezeption uns etwas. Leider bei genauerem Hinsehen leider viel zu teuer. Sie war wirklich sehr bemüht, aber ein zweites Mal würde ich den Service nicht mehr in Anspruch nehmen, da man das ganze viel billiger haben kann.
title: Schönes Hotel

text:
Meine Freundin und ich waren für 1 Nacht in diesem Hotel. Das Hotel ist ca. 10 min vom Flughafen entfernt. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und Ordentlich,jedoch nicht unbedingt die ruhigste Lage (Straßenseite).
Der Pool war ebenfalls sauber und relativ groß,zum abkühlen bzw. schwimmen perfekt.
Das Frühstück war sehr gut jedoch etwas wenig Auswahl. 
Das Personal war sehr freundlich und bei Fragen sehr hilfsbereit.

text:
帰国日のデイユースとして1泊3,000円程度で予約しました。

一人ではいいかもしれませんが幼児連れの3人では狭くスーツケースを
開けるスペースはありません。

部屋が西向きでしたので夕日がダイレクトにあたりクーラーを最強にしても
冷えず暑くて大変でした。

アメニティーは石鹸とタオル程度で若者で昼間は外出する方向けです。

韓国や中国の観光客が9割程度だと思います。
title: 帰国日（ＧＡ８８１便利用）のデイユースとして利用

photos.caption: レストランもあります
空港近く近のングラライバイパス沿いにあります。

text:
1. Le personnel: nous avons été accueilli comme des rois avec coktail et prise en charge de nos bagages à peine sorti du taxi. La manager est très aimable et au petit soin avec les clients. Tous les employés ont toujours le sourire.

2. L'emplacement : hôtel très proche de l'aéroport et du centre ville de kuta. L'hôtel peut vous louer un scooter afin de vous déplacer comme vous le souhaitez durant votre séjour.

3. L'équipement : les chambres sont bien décorées  (nous avions louer la chambre la plus simple), avec climatisation, produits de toilette dans la salle de bain, café, bouteilles d'eau  (mais pas de frigo). L'hôtel  possède également une très belle piscine et très large pour ceux qui aiment faire des longueurs! 
Il y a également un restaurant dans l'hôtel  mais que nous  n'avons pas eu la chance de tester, les prix étaient en tout cas très abordables.
Mais le GROS PLUS de l'hôtel est la superette dans le hall de l'hôtel ouverte 24h/24 pour tous les petits creux nocturnes!  

4. La propreté : Le ménage est très bien fait. Les draps sentent bon. Pas de tâches sur les draps, contrairement à d'autres hôtels que nous avons pu faire dans le pays.

5. Le prix: nous avons payé 81€ pour 5 nuits. C'est très bon marché.

Conclusion : cet hôtel est super si vous cherché un hôtel petit  budget mais avec un bon service. Évidemment ce n'est pas un 4 étoiles, il ne faut pas avoir des goûts de luxe pour apprécier cet hôtel car il est très simple,  mais ca reste le meilleur hôtel que nous avons fait en Indonésie et pourtant le moins cher!
title: Le meilleur dans sa catégorie!

owner_response.text:
Monsieur / Madame Zeynab,

Chaleureuses salutations de Natya Hôtel Kuta,
Nous vous remercions de nous avoir donné une note parfaite et de recommander notre hôtel à d'autres voyageurs. Il était agréable de vous avoir lors de votre récente visite à Bali. Je suis très heureux d'apprendre que notre service a rendu votre séjour agréable. J'espère que vous avez eu un séjour mémorable avec nous et prend friands de souvenirs à la maison.

Nous attendons avec impatience l'occasion de vous accueillir à nouveau dès que notre invité. S'il vous plaît ne pas hésiter à contacter si vous voudriez que je vous aider avec votre prochaine réservation.

Cordialement,

Gusti Paramarta
Directeur général

photos.caption: Vue depuis la chambre 123 au rez de chaussée
Kibla sur le plafond pour les voyageurs musulmans

text:
Hotel moderno y amigable. Cuenta con piscina y terrazas. Ubicación central, con bastante transporte a la salida del hotel. Lamentablemente nuestra única noche fue un poco problemática, ya que durante la tarde/noche se realizaba una fiesta privada en la piscina, con música en alto volumen que nos hizo reclamar a recepción ya que nuestra habitación estaba en el segundo piso en el mismo sector. Los recepcionistas solo pidieron disculpas por el ruido, a la cual exigimos cambio de habitación que fue generada sin problemas. 
El desayuno algo particular para gusto personal, se encuentra más comida elaborada que cosas básicas, estilo asiático con alimento poco tradicional (solo pan, mermelada, huevos y cereal con leche).
title: Bueno

text:
Hotel situato a due passi dal tempio di tanah lot. Sicuramente comodo per visitare questa attrattiva però forse eviterei di fermarmi li la notte. Dopo le 18 la zona è assolutamente isolata, si è costretti a cenare in albergo. Le camere sono molto spaziose e pulite, la colazione non è nulla di che,anzi smilza e poco soddisfacente. Carina la piscina all'aperto. 
ristorante buono e con prezzi accessibili,anche se alti rispetto alla media . Per quanto riguarda il servizio trasporto, voglio precisare che il signore alla reception ci ha chiamato un taxi, peccato che era un autista non ufficiale, che non conosceva le strade e che si è innervosito non poco durante il tragitto. Insomma, pessima esperienza!!!!
title: Oltre il tempio, il nulla!!!!!

text:
Hotel acolhedor, pessoal muito simpático e atencioso. Quarto limpo e de muita qualidade, 15 minutos a pé da praia de kuta... o único 'contra' é o pequeno almoço ser totalmente asiático, mas não é nada que mude a minha opinião. .  simplesmente maravilhoso!  Através do check in viram que o meu namorado fazia anos nessa semana e fizeram um bolo e um ramo de flores, adoramos à surpresa. Obrigada a toda a equipa.
Hotel perfect, clean and comfortable, staff five stars. 15 min walk for kuta beach.  Thanks a lot for natya team!! Just a opinion, change a little bit yours breakfast, put something European, like milk, bread, cheese/ham... but it's just this... all is perfect 😉 thanks for the cookie and flowers in my boyfriend birthday, it's a fantastic staff <3 thanks a lot natya hotel.
title: Perfeito/ perfect

text: Wir waren im April 2014 für 8 Tage in diesem Hotel und es hat uns eig sehr gut gefallen! Es ist sehr neu und sehr sauber! Das Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit und super freundlich! Es gab allerdings kein spa so wie es in der Beschreibung steht sondern das ist ein paar Minuten mit dem auto entfernt... Sonst ist es gut gelegen und hat einen Grossen Pool! Wir würden wieder hingehen!
title: Sehr sauberes, neues Hotel!

owner_response.text:
Lieber Anrede,

Herzliche Grüße aus Natya Hotel Kuta,
Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit nehmen, Ihren Aufenthalt bei uns zu überprüfen. Es war schön, dass Sie bei uns während des jüngsten Besuchs in Bali haben. Ich hoffe, dass Sie mit uns einen unvergesslichen Aufenthalt hatte und nimmt gern Erinnerungen nach Hause zurück. Sie könnten unsere Rezeption Agenten in Bezug auf alle Informationen gebeten, für weitere Infomationen benötigt.

Ich freue mich auf die Gelegenheit, Ihnen bald wieder begrüßen zu dürfen.
Bitte zögern Sie nicht uns zu kontaktieren, wenn Sie mich möchten Sie mit Ihrer nächsten Buchung zu unterstützen.

Dein,

Gusti Paramarta
